nodes.text: The Selonian Enclave was an embassy building located on the planet Corellia in the city of Coronet. It served as a diplomatic site for the Selonians, and was where the first Human League strike was made against their kind after an attack on a Selonian neighborhood in Bela Vistal.
The 2003 reference book Coruscant and the Core Worlds mistakenly identifies the Selonian Enclave as being located in Bela Vistal rather than Coronet.
